meanings.definition: A very large number equal to 10 raised to the power of 100.
meanings.sent1: A googol is a huge number that is 1 followed by 100 zeros.
meanings.sent2: The scientist talked about a googol when explaining the vastness of the universe.
meanings.sent3: I have a googol of toys in my room, but I can never find the one I want to play with!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as infinite as a googol, never-ending and immeasurable.
meanings.sent5: The idea of counting to a googol is mind-boggling and seems impossible.

meanings.definition: An extremely large quantity or amount.
meanings.sent1: The factory produced a googol of tiny screws in just one day.
meanings.sent2: There were a googol of stars shining brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: I have a googol of chores to do before I can go out and play.
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered with a googol of enthusiasm as the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with a googol of shiny gold coins.
